div.p: and AC-54E at different temperatures on ID28. Additionally, we measured the dispersion curve for Mn 3 Ge in (4 -2 1) and (0 0 3) gamma points at different temperatures. We used wavelength 0.6968 Ã… for measurements. Cryostream was used for temperature regulation. Temperature evolution of dispersion curves are shown in Fig. 1. Reciprocal maps for TiBi 0.
